Call of the Meeting
The City Council and School Committee will hold a Roundtable/Working meeting to begin discussions on a
preliminary School Department budget for Fiscal Year 2021.

Overview and Purpose
Mayor Siddiqui

Aligning CPS Budget with District Plan
Vice Chair Bowman

Overview of City Supports for CPS
City Manager DePasquale

Overview of CPS Budget Process, District Plan & Equity Work Framing
Superintendent Salim

Building Equity Bridges
BEB Team

Key Takeaways from Community Meetings & Principal Meetings
Superintendent Salim

Discussion
Mayor Siddiqui
